original_text: Now all the work of Solomon was prepared unto the day of the foundation of the house of the Lord, and until it was finished. So the house of the Lord was perfected.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전의 기초를 쌓던 날부터 준공하기까지 모든 것을 완비하였으므로 여호와의 전 공사가 결점 없이 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: Now all the work of Solomon was prepared
unto the day of the foundation of the house of the Lord
So the house of the Lord was perfected
